data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core YARNYSH3, Lake Yarnyshnoe, Russia

Lake in abundant lakes area. Physiography: glacier-soured basins. Surrounding vegetation: tundra/treeline (Betula pub. Pinus syl.). Local vegetation: ericoids. Location: from the lake-ice platform. Core diameter: 7.5 cm. Notes: from Alpadaba. Device: percussion driven piston corer
Postglacial climate and vegetation history, north-central Kola Peninsula, Russia: pollen and diatom records from Lake Yarnyshnoe-3
